Hello blank fragment About this app Granne is an app that makes it possible for you as an older person to find people who share the same interests as you. How does it work? The app uses data from your account to find similarities with other people. This process happens inside the Find Match window. However you will not be shown to other users until you have entered your interests.
Terms and condition By creating a Friendzone account or using the app via a mobile device mobile application or computer you agree that you are bound by these terms of use we may from time to time make changes to this agreement and the service we can do this for a variety of reasons reflecting_changes in or legal requirements new features or changes in business practices. You must be at least 18 years old to create an account on friendzone and use the service. Friendzone always strives to improve the service and give you more features that are interesting and useful to you this means that from time to time we may add new product features or make improvements and even remove certain features and if these actions do not significantly affect your rights or obligations we may not notify you before implementing them. You can terminate your account at any time for any reason! Register
